actions.name: AcceptInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to accept an Amazon Macie membership invitation

actions.name: BatchGetCustomDataIdentifiers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about one or more custom data identifiers

actions.name: BatchUpdateAutomatedDiscoveryAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie administrator to change the status of automated sensitive data discovery for one or more accounts in their organization

actions.name: CreateAllowList
actions.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for an allow list

actions.name: CreateClassificationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a sensitive data discovery job

actions.name: CreateCustomDataIdentifier
actions.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a custom data identifier

actions.name: CreateFindingsFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a findings filter

actions.name: CreateInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to send an Amazon Macie membership invitation

actions.name: CreateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an account with an Amazon Macie administrator account

actions.name: CreateSampleFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to create sample findings

actions.name: DeclineInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to decline Amazon Macie membership invitations

actions.name: DeleteAllowList
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an allow list

actions.name: DeleteCustomDataIdentifier
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom data identifier

actions.name: DeleteFindingsFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a findings filter

actions.name: DeleteInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Amazon Macie membership invitations

actions.name: DeleteMember
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the association between an Amazon Macie administrator account and an account

actions.name: DescribeBuckets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about S3 buckets that Amazon Macie monitors and analyzes

actions.name: DescribeClassificationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the status and settings for a sensitive data discovery job

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie configuration settings for an AWS organization

actions.name: DisableMacie
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an Amazon Macie account, which also deletes Macie resources for the account

actions.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an account as the delegated Amazon Macie administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: DisassociateFromAdministratorAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie member account to disassociate from its Macie administrator account

actions.name: DisassociateFromMasterAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie member account to disassociate from its Macie administrator account

actions.name: DisassociateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie administrator account to disassociate from a Macie member account

actions.name: EnableMacie
actions.description: Grants permission to enable and specify the configuration settings for a new Amazon Macie account

actions.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to enable an account as the delegated Amazon Macie administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: GetAdministratorAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie administrator account for an account

actions.name: GetAllowList
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the settings and status of an allow list

actions.name: GetAutomatedDiscoveryConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configuration settings and status of automated sensitive data discovery for an Amazon Macie administrator account, organization, or standalone account

actions.name: GetBucketStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated statistical data for all the S3 buckets that Amazon Macie monitors and analyzes

actions.name: GetClassificationExportConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the settings for exporting sensitive data discovery results

actions.name: GetClassificationScope
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the classification scope settings for an account

actions.name: GetCustomDataIdentifier
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the settings for a custom data identifier

actions.name: GetFindingStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated statistical data about findings

actions.name: GetFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of one or more findings

actions.name: GetFindingsFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the settings for a findings filter

actions.name: GetFindingsPublicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configuration settings for publishing findings to AWS Security Hub

actions.name: GetInvitationsCount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the count of Amazon Macie membership invitations that were received by an account

actions.name: GetMacieSession
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the status and configuration settings for an Amazon Macie account

actions.name: GetMasterAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie administrator account for an account

actions.name: GetMember
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an account that's associated with an Amazon Macie administrator account

actions.name: GetResourceProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve sensitive data discovery statistics and the sensitivity score for an S3 bucket

actions.name: GetRevealConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status and configuration settings for retrieving occurrences of sensitive data reported by findings

actions.name: GetSensitiveDataOccurrences
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve occurrences of sensitive data reported by a finding

actions.name: GetSensitiveDataOccurrencesAvailability
actions.description: Grants permission to check whether occurrences of sensitive data can be retrieved for a finding

actions.name: GetSensitivityInspectionTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the sensitivity inspection template settings for an account

actions.name: GetUsageStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve quotas and aggregated usage data for one or more accounts

actions.name: GetUsageTotals
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated usage data for an account

actions.name: ListAllowLists
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about all the allow lists for an account

actions.name: ListAutomatedDiscoveryAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of automated sensitive data discovery for an account

actions.name: ListClassificationJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about the status and settings for one or more sensitive data discovery jobs

actions.name: ListClassificationScopes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about the classification scope for an account

actions.name: ListCustomDataIdentifiers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all custom data identifiers

actions.name: ListFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about one or more findings

actions.name: ListFindingsFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all findings filters

actions.name: ListInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all the Amazon Macie membership invitations that were received by an account

actions.name: ListManagedDataIdentifiers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about managed data identifiers

actions.name: ListMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie member accounts that are associated with a Macie administrator account

actions.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the delegated Amazon Macie administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: ListResourceProfileArtifacts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about objects that Amazon Macie selected from an S3 bucket for automated sensitive data discovery

actions.name: ListResourceProfileDetections
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the types and amount of sensitive data that Amazon Macie found in an S3 bucket

actions.name: ListSensitivityInspectionTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about the sensitivity inspection template for an account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for an Amazon Macie resource

actions.name: PutClassificationExportConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the settings for storing sensitive data discovery results

actions.name: PutFindingsPublicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration settings for publishing findings to AWS Security Hub

actions.name: SearchResources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about AWS resources that Amazon Macie monitors and analyzes

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update the tags for an Amazon Macie resource

actions.name: TestCustomDataIdentifier
actions.description: Grants permission to test a custom data identifier

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Macie resource

actions.name: UpdateAllowList
actions.description: Grants permission to update the settings for an allow list

actions.name: UpdateAutomatedDiscoveryConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to change the status of automated sensitive data discovery for an Amazon Macie administrator account, organization, or standalone account

actions.name: UpdateClassificationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to change the status of a sensitive data discovery job

actions.name: UpdateClassificationScope
actions.description: Grants permission to update the classification scope settings for an account

actions.name: UpdateFindingsFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a findings filter

actions.name: UpdateMacieSession
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie administrator account to suspend or re-enable Macie for a member account

actions.name: UpdateMemberSession
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Macie administrator account to suspend or re-enable a Macie member account

actions.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Macie configuration settings for an AWS organization

actions.name: UpdateResourceProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update the sensitivity score for an S3 bucket

actions.name: UpdateResourceProfileDetections
actions.description: Grants permission to update the sensitivity scoring settings for an S3 bucket

actions.name: UpdateRevealConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status and configuration settings for retrieving occurrences of sensitive data reported by findings

actions.name: UpdateSensitivityInspectionTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update the sensitivity inspection template settings for an account
